about_the_game:
This DLC introduces Hawk, a powerful playable Contractor capable of using 20XX's awesome Powers to the fullest.

Hawk wields the sinister Siphon, a whip-like Primary Weapon capable of stealing energy from foes to fuel her Powers.

Hawk also has five unique Powers that only she can wield - from the self-aiming Seeking Striker to the high-flying Blastjump, mastery of these Powers pushes Hawk to heights previously not seen in 20XX.

(NOTE: The Hawk DLC enables Hawk for your play. When playing online, you'll be able to use Hawk, even if your partner doesn't have the DLC. The rest of the changes made in 1.12 are free for all players, and are part of the base game.)
detailed_description:
This DLC introduces Hawk, a powerful playable Contractor capable of using 20XX's awesome Powers to the fullest.

Hawk wields the sinister Siphon, a whip-like Primary Weapon capable of stealing energy from foes to fuel her Powers.

Hawk also has five unique Powers that only she can wield - from the self-aiming Seeking Striker to the high-flying Blastjump, mastery of these Powers pushes Hawk to heights previously not seen in 20XX.

(NOTE: The Hawk DLC enables Hawk for your play. When playing online, you'll be able to use Hawk, even if your partner doesn't have the DLC. The rest of the changes made in 1.12 are free for all players, and are part of the base game.)
name: 20XX - Hawk Character DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Toaster processor or better (2009+)
  • Graphics: Any card made during or after 2009
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Additional Notes: Laptop users: Some laptops will default to running 20XX off of their integrated GPU (instead of your good GPU). We strongly recommend that you run 20XX on your dedicated GPU.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Two toaster processors or better (2011+)
  • Graphics: Something made in the last five years
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

short_description: This DLC introduces Hawk, a powerful playable Contractor capable of using 20XX's awesome Powers to the fullest. Wield the sinister Siphon, stealing energy from your foes to fuel your unique Powers!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, French*, German*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
